item.title: Command does nothing
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

If your typing in the server “::dragon(pl)” and it’s not working its because you have if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("::dragon(pl)") Take away the “::” in the command or else the command you need to put it is “::::dragon(pl)” You can also make it so they can only do it once, but I kind of don’t know how to explain that…Just ask others about that.

Read full topic

item.title: Command does nothing

item.description:
@joeyjoe9876 wrote:

[code][code]i just made this command the other day adn it doesnt work

[/code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("::dragon(pl)")&& playerRights >= 2){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("::dragon1")){ //Voule Command Generator
addItem(1149,1);
addItem(3140,1);
addItem(4087,1);
addItem(4587,1);
addItem(1187,1);
sendMessage(“use once or ban!!”);
sendMessage(“only use once or may be banned”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has just gotten a drag set (platelegs)";
}[/code]

can some1 tell me wat i did wrong and how to fix it
